Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Hi all,

Does anyone know of a site where one can dump the exact software used for a
published set of experiments (rather than providing a link to a site that
may or may not still contain the software or particular version that was
used), all the relevant configuration files and other input, and perhaps
the output/results produced corresponding to the published results?

Cheers,
Oliver

--bcaec553ff3cad400104d2a722fe
